subject: Religion & Spirituality
title: The Future of World Religion
description: Learn The Future of World Religion in one minute.

hook.text: Islam will surpass Christianity by 2070. 'No religion' is the West's fastest category. Faith is shifting, not dying.

buildup.text: Secularism is rising in Europe and North America. Churches close while mosques and temples grow elsewhere.

discovery.text: Africa and Asia will shape religion's future. By 2060, four in ten Christians will be African.

twist.text: The 'spiritual but not religious' group keeps growing. People want meaning without institutions. Religions must adapt.

climax.text: Religion isn't disappearing â€” it's transforming. The Big Five will evolve, merge, and compete for centuries to come.

punchline.text: Religion isn't dying. It's moving south, going online, and evolving fast.

quiz.question: Which religion is projected to surpass Christianity by 2070?
